projects.title: Projects
projects.description: These are some of my beloved projects

projects.title: The Simpsons Trivia Game
projects.description: Trivia about the TV Show. After the user enters its name there are three categories to play.

projects.title: Data-Lovers
projects.description: Wikidex is a web application that allows the user to filter and order a list of 151 Pokemon from Kanto region.

projects.title: MD-Links
projects.description: Open source code library made to know the status of links inside a file with .md extension.

projects.title: SVKH
projects.description: Made as a vanilla Javascript SPA, this is a web site to make more visible this rare syndrome in Chile.

projects.title: Google Maps
projects.description: Web application created as a React app that allows the user to localize stores in Mexico City. The user can also add the store to favorites and delete it.

projects.title: Michi vs Shiba
projects.description: Smartphone application created with React Native based on the "Tic tac toe" game with a cat vs dog version.
